description: The Royal Canadian Mounted Police (RCMP) is seeking proposals from qualified suppliers for office furniture for Chilliwack, BC
full_summary:
# Meeting and Training Room Tables

*Solicitation Number:* M2989-2-0237/A
*Solicitation Type:* Request for Proposal
*Publication Date:* October 20, 2022
*Tender Closing Date:* October 31, 2022, 5:00 PM EST
*Government of Canada ID Gn:* PW-22-01010742
*Trade Agreement:* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
*CFTA Status:* Not CFTA Compliant
*Sources Sought Covered/ Unsourced Category:* GSIN
*GN Note:* Government Procurement Catalogue

## Solicitation Brief

*Bidder Information:* The Royal Canadian Mounted Police, 73 Leikin Dr, Ottawa, ON K1A OR2, Canada
*Contact Name:* Bev Martin
*Contact Email:* [beverly.martin@rcmp-grc.gc.ca](mailto:beverly.martin@rcmp-grc.gc.ca)
*Contact Phone Number:* 6046798264

## Description

The Royal Canadian Mounted Police (RCMP) requires the purchase, delivery and installation of desks and chairs by November 30, 2022, for 7 classrooms at the RCMP Pacific Region Training Centre in Chilliwack, British Columbia. 

## Instruction 

*Note of Solicitation:*

Read all instruction documents, linked below, before proceeding.
